description.@en: With questionable ingredients, you whip up a stew that’s extremely tasty yet curiously spicy.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of allies equal to your [WB]. Whenever they Injure a foe, they move one step up the Peril Condition Track positively. At the end of the Duration, all those who ate the stew suffer 3 Corruption.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the number of allies affected.

criticalFailure.@en: The feast is unsettling on everyone’s stomachs. For the Duration, any allies who ate the stew must Resist with a successful Toughness Test every hour for the Duration of the spell or else suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] physical Peril.

reagents.@en: Fresh innards from your own Ancestry, eaten by others (expended)
